alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Mellette and central Jackson Counties through 445 PM MDT/545 PM CDT/... At 413 PM MDT/513 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Potato Creek to 6 miles west of Black Pipe. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Corn Creek around 525 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 140 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
